text: Ariyevo () is a rural locality (a village) and the administrative center of Ariyevsky Selsoviet, Duvansky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 385 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 15 km from Mesyagutovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Duvansky District
title: Ariyevo
